Bellevue.Seattle Civic Center:
The Seattle Civic Center is a building complex in Seattle, Washington. The complex comprises several buildings owned by the city of Seattle and King County that cover several adjacent city blocks, including:
King County Administration Building
King County Correctional Facility
King County Courthouse
(King County) Yesler Building
Seattle City Hall
Seattle Justice Center
Seattle Municipal Tower
The complex also contained the Public Safety Building until it was demolished in 2005. The Seattle Civic Square Tower is proposed for the site.
